import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Logo from '../Logo/Logo' import '../Header/Header.css' const Header = () => { const getData = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer.totalItems); return (
Home All Books Our Contacts
); }; export default Header;
